definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: To be honest, I hadn't heard of your organization until my college advisor mentioned it.
sentences.chinese: 老实说，我是大学指导教授提到才知道贵公司的。

sentences.english: Where there is a change in the advisor, the student must re-submit the Thesis Proposal.
sentences.chinese: 指导教授变更时，须重新提出硕士论文计画书。

sentences.english: Students in Ph. D. program need to discuss the course plan with advisors.
sentences.chinese: 本系研究生修习所有科目须事先与指导教授讨论。

sentences.english: Have you talked to your supervisor about your thesis yet?
sentences.chinese: 你和你的指导教授讨论过论文了吗？

sentences.english: The guidance of a professor is a very famous music maestro.
sentences.chinese: 指导教授是个极其有名的音乐大师。

sentences.english: A meeting for M. A. course teachers and thesis advisers was held.
sentences.chinese: 举办研究所教师及指导教授会议。

sentences.english: Elective courses include project or thesis upon approval by the advisor.
sentences.chinese: 选修课还包括有指导教授的课题研究及论文课程。

definition: (Tw) teacher in charge of a class/homeroom teacher
to give classes/to work as a teacher
University of California/abbr. for 加利福尼亞大學|加利福尼亚大学[Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2]

pinyin: Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2

definition: doctoral degree/PhD/same as Doctor of Philosophy 哲學博士學位|哲学博士学位
Berkeley (name)/George Berkeley (1685-1753), Bishop of Cloyne, famous British philosopher/Berkeley, university city in the San Francisco bay area, California
